title: support tickets broken?
body:
so i was going to open a riot support ticket.. and i go to click the one to select... and then it said you must be logged in to submit a support ticket.. yet im already logged in?     is there something wrong with it? 

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Could be a local issue caused by an extension, or you may need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  If the issue persists, you can always hit us up directly via support@riotgames.com as well.
